pkgmetadata.longdescription: Discretization of AR(1) Processes // Discretize AR(1) process following Tauchen (1986) http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/a rticle/pii/0165176586901680. A discrete Markov chain that approximates in the sense of weak convergence a continuous- valued univariate Autoregressive process of first order is generated. It is a popular method used in economics and in finance.
